Adrien Fillon

Adrien Fillon

LinkedIn Twitter GitHub Instagram Email SInnoPSis ORCID Linktree

Hi There

I am Adrien, French researcher in Meta-science. I have a background in applied social psychology and expertise in conducting litterature review and meta-analysis. Besides my work as a researcher, I am also the host of the podcast “science of doing science”, a podcast dedicated to meta-science. I have a french Instagram account and newsletter where I talk about news in psychology. Hope you enjoy!

Education

2019 – 2022 Ph.D. in applied social psychology: Aix-Marseille University (France)

2016 – 2018 MS in applied social psychology: Paris Nanterre (France)

2013 – 2017 BS in psychology: Paris Nanterre (France)

Experience

2022 - 2024 • Postdoctoral fellow at SInnoPSis (Cyprus)

2019 - 2022 • Pedagogical engineer and trainer in a training center: Orsys

2018 • Trainer for AP-HP (Orbis deployment)

2017 - 2018 • Professional traineeship in Korda&Co: Development of pedagogical support for training programs and mindset interventions with managers and staff (530h)

2016 - 2017 • Traineeship in Psychopium: questionnaire design and survey, interview with the staff, writing of summary and reports (150h)

2014 - 2020 • Pedagogical support in psychology in the management coaching company Alsynea

2014 - 2015 • Traineeship in the LAPPS (Parisian laboratory of social psychology) Statistical treatment of political psychological data, Paris Nanterre (70h)
